__data__.text: This is Police Agent at 2025年02月13日（星期四）09:30 Plan：Wake up at 5；Have breakfast at 6:30；Start patrol duties at 7:00；Monitor crowd density and provide guidance at 8:00；Continue patrol and supervise Chinatown corridors at 9:00；Take a short break and rest at 10:30；Continue crowd management and guidance at 11:00；Have lunch at 12:00；Resume patrol and supervision at 13:00；Monitor and guide crowd in congested areas at 14:00；Take a break and hydrate at 15:30；Continue patrol and ensure public safety at 16:00；Conduct final patrol and check key access corridors at 17:00；Prepare for end of shift and review duty report at 18:00；Have dinner at 19:00；Watch TV at 20:00；Prepare for tomorrow's duty and rest at 21:00
